Verses: 1 sagala Aayakkaararum Paavigalum Avarudaiya Vasanangalaik Ketkumpadi Avaridaththil Vandhu Serndhaargal.
2 appozhudhu Pariseyarum Vedhapaarakarum Murumuruththu: Ivar Paavigalai Etrukkondu Avargalode Saappidugiraar Endraargal.
3 avargalukku Avar Sonna Uvamaiyaavadhu:

4 ungalil Oru Manushan Nooru Aadugalai Udaiyavanaayirundhu, Avaigalil Ondru Kaanaamarponaal, Thonnootronbadhu Aadugalaiyum Vanaandharaththile Vittu, Kaanaamarpona Aattaik Kandupidikkumalavum Thediththiriyaano?
5 kandupitiththapinbu, Avan Sandhoshaththode Adhaith Than Tholgalin Mel Pottukkondu,
6 veettukku Vandhu, Sinegidharaiyum Ayalagaththaaraiyum Kooda Varavazhaiththu: Kaanaamarpona En Aattaik Kandupidiththen, Ennodukooda Sandhoshappadungal Enbaan Allavaa?

7 adhupola, Manandhirumba Avasiyamillaadha Thonnootronbadhu Needhimaangalaikkuriththuch Sandhosham Undaagiradhaip Paarkkilum Manandhirumbugira Ore Paaviyinimiththam Paralogaththil Migundha Sandhosham Undaayirukkum Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.

8 andriyum, Oru Sthiree Paththu Vellikkaasai Udaiyavalaayirundhu, Adhil Oru Vellikkaasu Kaanaamarponaal, Vilakkaik Koluththi, Veettaip Perukki, Adhaik Kandupidikkiravaraikkum Jaakkiradhaiyaaith Thedaamaliruppaalo?
9 kandupidiththapinbu, Than Sinegidhigalaiyum Ayalveettukkaarigalaiyum Kooda Varavazhaiththu: Kaanaamarpona Vellikkaasaik Kandupidiththen, Ennodukooda Sandhoshappadungal Enbaal Allavaa?
10 adhupola Manandhirumbugira Ore Paaviyinimiththam Dhevanudaiya Thoodharukku Munbaakach Sandhoshamundaayirukkiradhu Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
11 pinnum Avar Sonnadhu: Oru Manushanukku Irandu Kumaarar Irundhaargal.
12 avargalil Ilaiyavan Than Thagappanai Nokki: Thagappane, Aasthiyil Enakku Varum Pangai Enakkuth Tharavendum Endraan. Andhappadi Avan Avargalukkuth Than Aasthiyaip Pangittukkoduththaan.
13 sila Naalaikkuppinbu, Ilaiyamagan Ellaavatraiyum Serththukkondu, Thoora Thesaththukkup Purappattuppoi, Ange Dhunmaarkkamaai Jeevanampanni, Than Aasthiyai Azhiththuppottaan.
14 ellaavatraiyum Avan Selavazhiththapinbu, Andha Dhesaththile Kodiya Panjamundaayitru. Appozhudhu Avan Kuraivupadaththodangi,
15 andha Dhesaththuk Kudigalil Oruvanidaththil Poi Ottikkondaan. Andhak Kudiyaanavan Avanaith Than Vayalgalil Pandrigalai Meykkumpadi Anuppinaan.
16 appozhudhu Pandrigal Thingira Thavittinaale Than Vayitrai Nirappa Aasaiyaayirundhaan, Oruvanum Adhai Avanukkuk Kodukkavillai.
17 avanukkup Buththi Thelindhapodhu, Avan: En Thagappanudaiya Koolikkaarar Eththanaiyo Perukkup Poorththiyaana Saappaadu Irukkiradhu, Naano Pasiyinaal Saagiren.
18 naan Ezhundhu, En Thagappanidaththirkup Poi: Thagappane, Paraththukku Virodhamaagavum Umakku Munbaagavum Paavanjeydhen.
19 inimel Ummudaiya Kumaaran Endru Sollappaduvadharku Naan Paaththiranalla, Ummudaiya Koolikkaararil Oruvanaaga Ennai Vaiththukkollum Enpen Endru Solli;
20 ezhundhu Purappattu, Than Thagappanidaththil Vandhaan. Avan Dhooraththil Varumpodhe, Avanudaiya Thagappan Avanaik Kandu, Manadhurugi, Odi, Avan Kazhuththaik Kattikkondu, Avanai Muththanjeydhaan.
21 kumaaran Thagappanai Nokki: Thagappane, Paraththukku Virodhamaagavum, Umakku Munbaakavum Paavanjeydhen, Inimel Ummudaiya Kumaaran Endru Sollappaduvadharku Naan Paaththiran Alla Endru Sonnaan.
22 appozhudhu Thagappan Than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Neengal Uyarndha Vasthiraththaik Konduvandhu, Ivanukku Uduththi, Ivan Kaikku Modhiraththaiyum Kaalgalukkup Paadharatchaigalaiyum Podungal.
23 kozhuththa Kandraik Konduvandhu Adiyungal. Naam Pusiththu, Sandhoshamaayiruppom.
24 en Kumaaranaagiya Ivan Mariththaan, Thirumbavum Uyirththaan; Kaanaamarponaan, Thirumbavum Kaanappattaan Endraan. Appadiye Avargal Sandhoshappadath Thodanginaargal.
25 avanudaiya Mooththakumaaran Vayalilirundhaan. Avan Thirumbi Veettukkuch Sameebamaai Varugirapodhu, Geedha Vaaththiyaththaiyum, Nadanakkalippaiyum Kettu;
26 oozhiyakkaararil Oruvanai Azhaiththu: Idhenna Endru Visaariththaan.
27 adharku Avan: Ummudaiya Sagodharan Vandhaar, Avar Marupadiyum Sugaththudane Ummudaiya Thagappanidaththil Vandhu Serndhapadiyinaale Avarukkaagak Kozhuththa Kandrai Adippiththaar Endraan.
28 appozhudhu Avan Kobamadaindhu, Ulle Poga Manadhillaadhirundhaan. Thagappano Veliye Vandhu, Avanai Varundhiyazhaiththaan.

29 avan Thagappanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Idho, Iththanai Varushakaalamaai Naan Umakku Oozhiyanjeydhu, Orukkaalum Ummudaiya Karpanaiyai Meeraadhirundhum, En Sinegidharode Naan Sandhoshamaayirukkumpadi Neer Orukkaalum Enakku Oru Aattukkuttiyaiyaavadhu Kodukkavillai.
30 vesigalidaththil Ummudaiya Aasthiyai Azhiththuppotta Ummudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Ivan Vandhavudane Kozhuththa Kandrai Ivanukkaaga Adippiththeere Endraan.
31 adharkuth Thagappan: Magane, Nee Eppodhum Ennodirukkiraai, Enakkulladhellaam Unnudaiyadhaayirukkiradhu.

32 un Sagodharanaagiya Ivano Mariththaan, Thirumbavum Uyirththaan; Kaanaamarponaan, Thirumbavum Kaanappattaan; Aanapadiyinaale, Naam Sandhoshappattu Magizhchchiyaayirukka Vendume Endru Sonnaan Endraar.
